title: Bleeds My Desire
description: EVELYN FONTAINE - She was forced to choose between two paths, and both of them led to death.ADRAMELECH KHAAVEDRA - The cruel vampire lord who sought to use her in his sinister plotting.CORBIN LIANDRALL - He started out as her victim; and now, he might just prove to be her savior...if she doesn't kill him first.DESIREE LEVINE - The woman who changed everything.Warnings: Dub-con, gore, violence, content not appropriate for those under 18.
author: Nenia Campbell
